EmailTemplate.subject: Haiti 2014 - One Week Payment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
I was able to connect with most of you today, either by phone or I left a voicemail.
This is just a reminder about the following things:
Payment Deadline:
There is one week left to fundraise for your trip so share your Canada Helps page and finish off all of your fundraising plans.
$300 deposit should already be on your page to secure your spot $2,295 is due March 1, 2014
Booking your flights:
If you haven't already checked out your trip page, please do so this week so you can become familiar with our trip itinerary and when it is time to book flights, please book them to Puerto Plata, DR: http://livedifferent.com/hero-holiday/trips/public-trip-ht-2014http://livedifferent.com/hero-holiday/trips/christmas-public-trip
Airport: Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic - Airport Code: POP Arrival: May 9, 2014 Departure: May 18, 2014
Flight itineraries:
Once you have booked your flights, please forward me the flight itinerary that your airlines sent you.
Travel Insurance:
Please provide me with the following: Insurance Provider Policy # Phone number (toll free) Phone number (collect call)
Please e-mail me back with more questions or concerns you may have. I look forward to answering them for you!
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
